job description:
Lead Data Scientist
Our Advanced Analytics and Emerging Technologies team is currently in need of a Senior Data Scientist to help us, as an organization, make smarter, more insightful decisions. This is a perfect opportunity to become a part of an innovative and energetic team that solves critical problems across a large, growing organization.

What You Need for this Position
Education plus Experience:
  • 8+ years experience in advanced analytical/Data Science with BS in Statistics, Applied Mathematics or closely related degree.
  • 6+ years experience in advanced analytical/Data Science with MS in Statistics, Applied Mathematics or closely related degree.
  • 4+ years experience in advanced analytical/Data Science with PhD in Statistics, Applied Mathematics or closely related degree.
Must have experience:
  • Excellence in understanding of statistical algorithms and machine learning techniques.
  • Excellence in pattern recognition and predictive modeling skills
Must Have Technical experience:
  • Expertise with common data science tool kits, such as SAS, R, etc.
  • Expertise with data visualization tools.
  • Expertise with NoSQL databases, such as HBase
  • Expertise with query languages such as SQL, Hive, Pig.
  • Expertise in scripting and programming skills using Python.
What's In It for You
Exceptional Total compensation plan (401K w/ Co. Match/Contribution, multiple medical plan options, Bonus opportunity and more!)

Are you a fit? If so, please send your resume to reggie.panis@cybercoders.com and thuan.lee@cybercoders.com
  • Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.

    CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Your Right to Work In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
